DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is compare treatment with valsartan with the possible addition of a diuretic, hydrochlorothiazide, on high blood pressure with the drug amlodipine with the possible addition of a diuretic, hydrochlorothiazide. In particular, the effect of treatment on the stiffness of the blood vessels will be studied.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy and Safety of Valsartan Versus Amlodipine in Postmenopausal Women With Hypertension
